segments.text: Looking at this scene, the kitchen seems ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing that plate like it's the most important thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is tied neatly, dress just right for housework.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the sink is flooding everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could slip any second on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stool is stretching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside the cookie jar, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling dangerously; he might fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is eagerly waiting with her arm raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this risky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden, so contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR
